about:
Hello there! üëã I'm an experienced web developer with a journey that began back in 2009. My educational background is a Higher National Diploma (HND) in Computing, specialized in Business Information Technology. Throughout my professional journey, I've had the privilege of working across diverse industries including computer software, fashion, automotive, agency, and marketing.

My proficiency spans a wide spectrum of programming languages ‚Äì PHP, C#, Go, NodeJs, Python, and Javascript ‚Äì enabling me to craft remarkable digital experiences. Yet, my skill set isn't confined to web development; I've also successfully crafted CLI applications, hybrid desktop and mobile applications.

What sets me apart is my unwavering commitment to staying ahead of the curve. I ardently stay updated with the latest trends in web development, ensuring that I wield the latest tools and techniques.

Beyond coding, I nurture a profound passion for exploration. Whether it's venturing into new destinations through travel, leisurely strolls by the city or the beach, or finding delight in caf√© and mall adventures ‚Äì I take pleasure in life's simple joys.

In a nutshell, I'm a dedicated developer who loves turning ideas into functional, user-friendly, and visually appealing digital solutions. My journey through various industries has given me a unique perspective that I bring to every project. Looking forward to exploring new horizons and crafting more digital wonders! üöÄ

education.major: Higher National Diploma (HND) in Computing (Business Information Technology)
education.tech_stack: MySQL, MSSQL, C++, C#, Visual Basic (.NET), Java, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
education.final_project: Develop Command Prompt(CMD), desktop, and web applications.

experiences.company_desc: 2X is B2B Marketing-as-a-Service (MaaS) firm, focused on providing end-to-end marketing expertise for established companies in the technology and professional services industries. The business is owned by an American company, and its clients include startups, SMEs, tech companies, and corporations from the US.
MyTukar is an online car bidding platform that allows you to sell used cars effortlessly and hassle-free through live bidding with over 1,000 dealers nationwide.

experiences.company_name: APD Digital Services Sdn Bhd (knows as GrowthOps)
experiences.company_desc: APD is a 360-degree digital services business that delivers growth to its clients. We consult with companies across the region to understand their business challenges and their digital needs in this constantly changing category. The clients primarily consist of local telcos, corporations, banks, and manufacturers who seek to enhance their digital marketing strategies.
POPLOOK is one of Malaysia's leading e-commerce and online stores specializing in modest fashion and ships worldwide.

experiences.position_title: Web Developer cum Web Designer, Support Programme
experiences.company_desc: OORA specializes in offering social media integrative solutions and membership. The business is owned by an Australian individual, and its clients consist of startups, SMEs, and manufacturing companies from Australia, Malaysia, and other countries.

CDI offers an opportunity for millions of students to score straight A's in their examinations through the company's e-learning program. It is also capable of assisting parents in acquiring financial independence through the company's unique business plan.
Studio c88i offers web and online marketing services for local businesses.
